sentences.en: Giving an arsonist a lighter is beyond a joke.
sentences.cn: 把打火机交给纵火犯简直是不可理喻。

sentences.en: He immediately snapped his lighter to light her cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他啪的一声急忙打着他的打火机，给她的香烟点着了。

sentences.en: He offered his lighter at full stretch.
sentences.cn: 他伸长胳膊把打火机递了过去。

sentences.en: His head felt lighter in some indefinable way.
sentences.cn: 他的头不知为何有点晕眩。

sentences.en: It is one of his finest works in a lighter vein.
sentences.cn: 这是他行文风格轻松活泼的作品中最出色的作品之一。

sentences.en: Modern tennis rackets are now apparently 20 per cent lighter.
sentences.cn: 现代的网球拍据说比以前的轻20%。

sentences.en: Refill packs are cheaper and lighter.
The box is lighter than that one.
sentences.cn: 这只箱子较那只箱子轻.

sentences.en: The colour is lighter, and the old paint shows through.
sentences.cn: 新漆的颜色较淡, 原来的漆的颜色都看得见.

sentences.en: The heavy dark table is inlaid with lighter wood.
sentences.cn: 笨重的深色桌子上嵌有颜色较浅的木头。

sentences.en: The lighter works off the car battery.
sentences.cn: 引燃器利用汽车蓄电池打火.

sentences.en: The new color is lighter, and the old paint shows through.
sentences.cn: 新刷的漆颜色较浅, 使原来的漆显露出来.

sentences.en: The paint can be diluted with water to make a lighter shade.
sentences.cn: 这颜料可用水稀释以使色度淡一些。

sentences.en: The portrait was touched up so as to make it lighter.
sentences.cn: 这张画经过润色,色调明朗了一些.

sentences.en: They jettisoned big boxes to make the bus lighter.
sentences.cn: 他们抛弃公共汽车上的货物,使车减轻重量.

trans.tran_cn: 明亮的；光明的；照明好的；光线充足的
打火机，点火器，点火者，驳船
trans.tran_en: a small object that produces a flame for lighting cigarettes etc
